name: nventiveReleaseNotesCompiler
description: A task to generate a markdown file containing release notes for a given release.
author: nventive

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Application environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment targeted by the application (Staging, Production, etc.)

inputs.name: RepositoryUrlFile
inputs.label: Repository URL file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file containing the URL of the repository.

inputs.name: AdditionalReleaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Additional release notes file
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file containing additional release notes to append at the end of the ones generated.

OutputVariables.name: ReleaseNotesPath
OutputVariables.description: The path to the generated release notes.
